name: Alien Hostage(Preview)
description:
Alien Hostage is a very hard physics sim game. The objective of the game is to collect all the props with out blowing up and then proceed to the next stage there are only 5 stages in this pre-alpha preview. When the game is at a solid stage with up to 50+ levels i plan to greenlight the game. You are also able to use slow motion by pressing S to toggle.

You can also check the game out on INDIEDB:

http://www.indiedb.com/games/alien-hostage

Please note the youtube video is of early game play before the preview was even considered.
